title: NASA’s first look at a sample from asteroid Bennu reveals life’s building blocks
description: Scientists have begun to analyze roughly 250 grams of Bennu, which could offer insight into solar system formation and life’s origins on Earth.

title: A monkey survived two years with a miniature pig’s kidney
description: A new study is the latest in a string of efforts seeking to use other animal species to solve the global organ shortage in people.

title: In a first, astronomers spot the afterglow of an exoplanet collision
description: A surge of infrared light from a remote star might have been a glow cast by the vaporized leftovers of an impact between Neptune-sized worlds.
